sentences.sContent: Everyone seemed rather out of sorts and inclined to croak .
sentences.sContent_eng: Everyone seemed rather out of sorts and inclined to croak .
sentences.sCn: 每个人似乎都有点不对劲，想发发牢骚。

remMethod.val: 童话故事里， 披着斗篷(cloak)的一群青蛙发出一阵蛙鸣声(croak)

words.tran: 呱呱叫的；（声音）低沉而沙哑的
嘎声的人；喊冤者，鸣冤者

trans.tranOther: the sound that a  frog  makes
